title: New Client doesn't do "Alternate login Check"
body:
The old league client would not allow your account to be logged in from more than one location. 
However, if you log into the Alpha, and then the old client, this is permitted. 
Logging into the old client, and then the alpha, kills the old client. 

Uncertain if by design - but if so, seems like a security hole.

replies.body: This is a bug, itll be fixed sometime soon. Thanks for letting us know :)
Thanks! I just found the 'report a bug' section. Did you want me to also log it there? It sounds like you're aware of it.
